sourcesContent:
import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row,Col,ListGroup,Image,Card,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' import { getOrderDetails,deliverOrder} from '../actions/orderActions' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { ORDER_DELIVERED_RESET } from '../constants/orderConstansts' const OrderScreen = ({}) => { const dispatch=useDispatch() const {id}=useParams() console.log('this is id') console.log(id); const orderDetail=useSelector((state)=>state.orderDetail) const {order,loading,error}=orderDetail const deliverOrder=useSelector(state=>state.deliverOrder) const {loading:loadingDeliver,success:successDeliver}=deliverOrder const userLogin=useSelector(state=>state.userLogin) const {userInfo}=userLogin useEffect(()=>{ if(!order ||successDeliver){ dispatch({type:ORDER_DELIVERED_RESET}) dispatch(getOrderDetails(id))} },[dispatch,id,successDeliver,order]) console.log(orderDetail) // if(loading===false){ // order.itemsPrice=(order.orderItems.reduce((acc,item)=>acc+item.price*item.qty,0)) // } // console.log(order) const deliveredHandler=()=>{ dispatch(deliverOrder(id)) } return loading?:error?{error} :<>

Order {order._id}

Shipping

Name: {order.user.name}

{order.user.email}

Address: {order.shippingAddress.address},{order.shippingAddress.city}{' '} {order.shippingAddress.postalcode},{' '} {order.shippingAddress.country}

{order.isDelivered ? Delivered on {order.deliveredAt}: Not Delivered }

Payment Method

Method: {order.paymentMethod}

{order.isPaid ? Paid on {order.paidAt}: Not paid }

Order Items

{order.orderItems.length === 0 ?Order is empty :( {order.orderItems.map((item,index)=>( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} =${item.qty*item.price} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items {/* ${order.itemsPrice} */} Shipping ${order.shippingPrice} Tax ${order.taxPrice} Total ${order.totalPrice} {loadingDeliver && } {userInfo.isAdmin && order.isPaid && !order.isDelivered && ( )} } export default OrderScreen
